db:abstract.db:para: Manages a collection of user scripts.
This type was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: WebEngineScriptCollection handles a user scripts collection, which is injected in the JavaScript engine during the loading of web content.
Use WebEgineView.userScripts and WebEngineProfile.userScripts to access the collection of scripts associated with a single page or number of pages sharing the same profile.

The collection of user script objects in QML can be created for a set of user script objects by simple assignment to WebEngineScriptCollection.collection property or by WebEngineScriptCollection methods.

db:note.db:para: The new user script can be instantiated with JavaScript dictionaries when using collection property.

db:section.db:para: See the following code snippets demonstrating the usage:

db:listitem.db:para: collection property with user script object as value type
user script collection insert method can be used only with value type or list of value types
db:listitem.db:programlisting:
var script = WebEngine.script() script.name = "FOO" webEngineView.userScripts.insert(script)
var list = [ script ] webEngineView.userScripts.insert(list)

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] collection : list<WebEngineScript>
db:section.db:para: This property holds a JavaScript array of user script objects. The array can take WebEngineScript basic type or a JavaScript dictionary as values.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] void clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all script objects from this collection.
This method was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] void contains(WebEngineScript script)
db:section.db:para: Checks if the specified script is in the collection.
This method was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] list<WebEngineScript> find(string name)
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of all user script objects with the given name.
This method was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] void insert(WebEngineScript script)
db:section.db:para: Inserts a single script into the collection.
This method was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] void insert(list<WebEngineScript> list)
db:section.db:para: Inserts a list of WebEngineScript values into the user script collection.
This method was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 6.2] bool remove(WebEngineScript script)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if a given script is removed from the collection.
This method was introduced in QtWebEngine 6.2.
